segments.text: Welcome to IBA . Which service do you require ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope you can help me . I've been told about something called ' Financing Link ' ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that is our Personal Wealth Management Service .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . Financing Link is a value-added service , and can be tailored to suit your requirements .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So , I can choose exactly what services I require ? That's brilliant . Can I use the card if I'm overseas to withdraw my daily expenses ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . We can arrange the structure to suit whatever you require . That's why this service is so popular ; it's suitable for everyone because we make it that way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is just what I've been looking for . Sign me up right away , please .
segments.speaker: S2
